channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington must keep his promise to not make a mess in 'Paddington's Goo Monster', then in 'Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure', Paddington and Simi go on a journey into the human body.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Daring Danny X is performing a new stunt. He is harnessed over a canyon eating an extreme lunch when the wind blows him upside down.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A superfood cake creates some super heroes in 'Paddington's Hero Squad', then in 'Paddington's Knightly Quest', Paddington wants to become a Knight; but needs to complete heroic quests.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Windsor Gardens has two new heroes in 'Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant', then in 'Paddington and the Accidental Hero', Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George is upset when he loses his favourite toy in 'Mr Dinosaur is Lost', and then in 'Best Friend', Peppa loves playing doctors and nurses with her best friend, Suzy Sheep.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: Meet Issy and her water-loving chocolate Labrador, Mo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! When a group of baby ducklings waddles away from their mummy, it's up to Issy and Mo to bring them back safe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Benny embrace his singing skills in 'Singin' in the Tub', then in 'Show and Share', Dora helps Boots find something for Show and Share.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots needs to rescue Isa on their 'Friendaversary Adventure', then in 'Swiper's Birthday Surprise', Dora brings a gift to a Swiper's party and must stop him from swiping his own gift.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: The cadets build a massive landcastle for Spyke's farewell.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Spyke befriends a seagull named Hungry, leading to chaos on Kangaroo Beach.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora takes a rain cloud to a water slide in 'Partly Claudia', then in 'Ranita's Magic Stripes', Dora helps Ranita earn her magic healing stripes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Dwayne is turned into a tracker dog to help his uncle to catch the Smurfs in 'Gargamel's Doggy', then in 'Drummer Girl', Gargamel bewitches Meteorite's drum and hypnotizes the Smurfies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: Dr. Fuzzleglove accidentally turns himself into a possum in 'Awesome Possum!', then in 'Baby Yoyo!', Bex learns to relax when she babysits the Mayor's daughter with Steve & Stumpy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The duo must figure out why bats are suddenly sneezing in 'The Bat Cave Crisis', and then in 'The Mysterious Ant Circle', biting army ants march through a birthday picnic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots help fix their friend's running shoes in 'Run Cynthia Run', then in 'Dora In Space', Dora and Boots rescue Tico from space after his spaceship falls apart.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Elana and Meeka, a mixed-breed dog, as they join The Real Pup Squad! There's a big mess in the garden - plastic bottles, cardboard boxes, and all sorts of rubbish everywhere.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: While Mummy Pig is enjoying a spa day out, Daddy, George and Peppa explore the rest of the shopping centre.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends go to school early to have breakfast together.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Potato visits the school to talk about fruit and vegetables. But which team will win his quiz.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Factory is deep down in the roots of The Great Elf Tree. It is almost Christmas time and the elves are busy making toys. Some magic saves the day when there is a problem.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum and The Wise Old Elf each think they work harder than the other. King Thistle commands them to swap for the day to find out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Granny Thistle comes to visit and gives Daisy and Poppy a powerful magical wand. The children escape from the castle and. go bananas.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: When Sir Topham Hatt's springtime parade floral float is destroyed before delivery, Thomas and the engines find the spring in Sodor to save the parade.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: None of the engines want to deliver a super stinky compost delivery, so they make a "hide and stink" game sneakily coupling it to each other. After a spill, they must all work together to finally deli.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Spyke's first day of training is filled with excitement, but she forgets to pay attention in class.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Gh?rkinn's family visits, but they find out he hasn't been entirely truthful with them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: A bad haircut threatens to ruin more than just Steve's good looks in 'Bad Hair Day!', then in 'Kanga Ruiner!', the team travels to Australia to stop a giant Mecha-Roo.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Chef makes some delicious cat food for Azrael in 'Smurfalicious Catfood', and then in 'Waffle Thief', Dwayne loves Lily's waffles and keeps wanting more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots gets Tico a Guayabera shirt in 'A Guayabera For Tico', then in 'Falling Estrella's', Dora returns three missing stars to their constellation.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger babysits in 'Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies', then in 'Pups Save the Green House', Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger get locked in a greenhouse and need a rescue.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Al's animals go missing when 'Pups Save a Sleepover', and then in 'Pups Save the Carnival', Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival and the prizes have gone missing too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Mysterious lights are messing up the dancing at the firefly prom in 'The Unidentified Shiny Object', and in 'The Case of the Crying Monkey', the duo follows sounds to locate a baby monkey.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The duo must figure out why bats are suddenly sneezing in 'The Bat Cave Crisis', and then in 'The Mysterious Ant Circle', biting army ants march through a birthday picnic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day, but MerCat accidentally loses her colour and sparkle.

channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger disguises himself to steal a purple pearl in 'Aqua Pups Save a Merdinger', then in 'Aqua Pups Save the Whale Patroller', Moby swipes the Whale Patroller - and the Pups' vehicles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: A storm cancels Peppa and her family's adventure plans so they decide to take it inside. Using their imagination, they go sledding, climb a mountain and have a campfire in the attic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George are playing in their pool. They help the garden animals cool down but when it rains, the animals are happy and so is Peppa. Rain makes muddy puddles for jumping in.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa is building something in his shed. It is his latest pet project. It's a robot called Frank.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: While visiting Suzy and Emily's house, Peppa is surprised there are extra rules she doesn't have in her own house like no shoes indoors and no eating peanuts.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is at Suzy's house and there is a pile of cardboard boxes so, they take them outside to play with. Peppa turns the boxes into a cardboard shop, a spaceship and even a hospital.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Today is a special day because Mummy and Daddy Pig have big news to tell Peppa and George. However, Peppa and George struggle to wait patiently, so resort to playing games.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Rainbows are a pirate's best friend - if you're looking for a pot of gold. But, if like Captain Squid you are hiding treasure, then rainbows are a pirate's worst enemy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when no one has remembered to pack lunch, they ask Holly to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Everyone is visiting snooty King and Queen Marigold's Castle. King and Queen Marigold give them a tour, which is not without a few mishaps.
